English.Text: The first mate's threats are weak, and any punishment is better than an army of skeletons as far as the crew are concerned. "If ... if you refuse...you will be whipped do you hear? I don't like doing it, but I will if I have to!" The crew laugh, "admit it sir, you don't even want to go into that skull yourself!" With the first mate's authority undermined, confidence in the expedition's leadership reaches a new low.
